definition.text: A federal presidential republic and the second-largest country in South America. Defined by its immigrant heritage, complex federal structure, and oscillation between developmentalist and neoliberal economic models.

works.title: Actor Set Evolution
works.description: From Viceroyalty to Confederation and Peronist era transitions, 1816 to present.

works.title: Institutional Map
works.description: Province and autonomous city distribution across the federal structure.

works.title: Inter-Agency Graph
works.description: Federal-provincial fiscal relations and co-participation dynamics.
